name: Dassie Town
description:
You are a heroic  plumber sent to sort out the water troubles of a small town in the drought stricken South African Karoo. Meet all the quirky residents of this small rural Afrikaans town,  learning its history and troubles, while you bring water back to the houses and people of Dassie Town.

Using pipes you will connect various tanks of water, including the big truck you came with, to all the  houses, ponds and storage tanks of the town. But the whole town is open to you, so its up to you which areas to sort out first, and to figure out the best paths to bring water to new areas. Each section of town is its own puzzle to be figured out, with townsfolk to chat to and gossip to be heard.

Can you bring back the water to Dassie Town ?

Created by  Imaan Abusamra, Ewan Anfield and Jack Rathbone
